svg.script: function go() { // Check that dynamic times are not prematurely reset during a forwards seek var svg = document.documentElement; var a = document.getElementById('a'); svg.pauseAnimations(); svg.setCurrentTime(1); a.beginElement(); // Interval: 1s-3s a.endElementAt(2); svg.setCurrentTime(2); // Should not cause end time at t=3s to be reset svg.setCurrentTime(3); // Should no longer be active svg.removeAttribute("class"); }
